short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily switch between hosts for the same path/endpoint.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Host switcher is a useful tool for switching host names on urls. Can be used by developers and testers to view the same endpoint on different hosts.
